info.title: NEON Data API Requests
info.description: Expand the options below, click GET, and then click TRY IT OUT to see example calls.

get.description: Get information about all data products.
Get information about a data product.

parameters.name: productCode
parameters.description: Data product to get

parameters.name: siteCode
parameters.description: Site to get

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: Location to get

parameters.name: history
parameters.description: Option to obtain location history information

parameters.name: hierarchy
parameters.description: Option to obtain location hierarchy information

parameters.name: locationType
parameters.description: "When obtaining location hierarchy, specify a type of descendant to query for. For example, to obtain the location hierarchy for all towers at location CPER, utilize: /CPER?hierarchy=true&locationType=TOWER"

get.description: Get information about the site-level locations.
Get files available for a given product/site/month combination

parameters.name: productCode
parameters.description: Product to check for files

parameters.name: siteCode
parameters.description: Site to check for files

parameters.name: year-month
parameters.description: YYYY-MM month to check for files

parameters.name: package
parameters.description: Package type to return, basic or expanded

400.description: Product, site not found or invalid date range specified

parameters.name: taxonTypeCode
parameters.description: Taxon type code to get. Must not be used in conjunction with a taxon rank query parameter.

parameters.name: kingdom
parameters.description: The taxon rank to get. Must not be used in conjunction with taxon type code.

parameters.name: phylum
parameters.description: The taxon rank to get. Must not be used in conjunction with taxon type code.

parameters.name: division
parameters.description: The taxon rank to get. Must not be used in conjunction with taxon type code.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The taxon rank to get. Must not be used in conjunction with taxon type code.

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: The taxon rank to get. Must not be used in conjunction with taxon type code.

parameters.name: family
parameters.description: The taxon rank to get. Must not be used in conjunction with taxon type code.

parameters.name: genus
parameters.description: The taxon rank to get. Must not be used in conjunction with taxon type code.

parameters.name: scientificname
parameters.description: The taxon rank to get. Must not be used in conjunction with taxon type code.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Get verbose result set

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to limit the result set to

parameters.name: stream
parameters.description: Option to obtain the result as a stream. Utilize for large requests.

count.description: The number of results in the current paged response

total.description: The total number of results for the query

prev.description: Link to the previous page of results when available

next.description: Link to the next page of results when available

400.description: Taxonomic data does not exist for specified query

get.description: Get a list of sample custody events, parent samples and child samples for a given sample identifier.

parameters.name: sampleTag
parameters.description: Sample Tag of interest.  Must be used in conjunction with a Sample Class only.

parameters.name: sampleClass
parameters.description: Sample Class of interest. Must be used in conjunction with a Sample Tag only.

parameters.name: sampleUuid
parameters.description: UUID of Sample.  Must be used on its own.

parameters.name: barcode
parameters.description: Barcode of Sample.  Must be used on its own.

parameters.name: archiveGuid
parameters.description: archiveGuid of Sample.  Must be used on its own.

get.description: Get a list of Sample Classes for a given Sample Tag

parameters.name: sampleTag
parameters.description: Sample Tag of interest

200.description: List of sample classes for a given Sample Tag

get.description: Get a list of sample classes and descriptions currently supported by the Sample Viewer

200.description: List of supported sample classes and their descriptions

get.description: Get a list of sample views for a given sample identifier and search degree.

parameters.name: sampleTag
parameters.description: Sample Tag of interest.  Must be used in conjunction with a Sample Class only.

parameters.name: sampleClass
parameters.description: Sample Class of interest. Must be used in conjunction with a Sample Tag only.

parameters.name: sampleUuid
parameters.description: UUID of Sample.  Must be used on its own.

parameters.name: barcode
parameters.description: Barcode of Sample.  Must be used on its own.

parameters.name: archiveGuid
parameters.description: archiveGuid of Sample.  Must be used on its own.

parameters.name: degree
parameters.description: degree of sample search

productCode.description: Revisioned, shortened code for the data product (DP1.00001.001, DP1.10072.001, etc)

productCodeLong.description: Revisioned, long code for the data product (NEON.DOM.SITE.DP1.00001.001, etc)

productName.description: The name of the data product.

productDescription.description: A brief description of the data product.

productAbstract.description: An abstract for the data product.

productHasExpanded.description: Whether a data product has expanded data

productBasicDescription.description: A description of the basic package available for download

productExpandedDescription.description: A description of the expanded package available for download

productScienceTeam.description: Science team responsible for the data product

productScienceTeamAbbr.description: Three letter abbreviation for the data science team.

productPublicationFormatType.description: Class of publication system used during the publication process; can be independent from productScienceTeam.

productStatus.description: Future, active, or retired product status

changeLogs.description: List of issues and associated details for the product.

parentIssueID.description: The identifier for the parent issue that this issue is associated with.

issueDate.description: The date and time associated with the creation of the issue.

resolvedDate.description: The date and time associated with the resolution of the issue.

dateRangeStart.description: The start of the date interval that this issue impacts the data product.

dateRangeEnd.description: The end of the date interval that this issue impacts the data product.

locationAffected.description: The locations affected by this issue.

resolution.description: The description of the resolution applied for this issue.

keywords.description: List of words and phrases associated with the data product

siteCodes.description: List of sites and months of available data

siteCode.description: Four character code for the site

availableMonths.description: List of years and months that products are available.  Formatted as YYYY-MM.

availableDataUrls.description: List of data urls for products that are available.

specs.description: List of documents associated with the data product.

themes.description: List of themes to which the data product belongs.

specId.description: Document code for the associated document.

domainCode.description: Three character domain abbreviation (D01, D02, etc) for the domain this site is in

domainName.description: Brief description for the domain this site is in

siteCode.description: Four character code for the site

stateCode.description: Two letter state code that this site is in

stateName.description: Full name of the state or territory that this site is in

dataProductCode.description: Revisioned, shortened code for the data product (DP1.00001.001, DP1.10072.001, etc)

dataProductTitle.description: Full title for the data product.

availableMonths.description: List of years and months that products are available.  Formatted as YYYY-MM.

availableDataUrls.description: List of data urls for products that are available.

locationUtmZone.description: The integer Universal Transverse Mercator zone.

locationUtmHemisphere.description: The single character Universal Transverse Mercator hemisphere.

alphaOrientation.description: The angle (in degrees) at which the sensor is facing relative to true North.

xOffset.description: Cartesian offsets of a sensor, in meters, east (positive values) or west (negative values) relative to where the geolocation point was taken.

yOffset.description: Cartesian offsets of a sensor, in meters, north (positive values) or south (negative values) relative to where the geolocation point was taken.

zOffset.description: Cartesian offsets of a sensor, in meters, up (positive values) or down (negative values) relative to where the geolocation point was taken.

coordinates.description: A list of vertices that define the closed structure for the polygon

latitude.description: Decimal latitude for the polygon coordinate.

longitude.description: Decimal longitude for the polygon coordinate.

locationChildren.description: A list of names of locations within this location.

locationChildrenUrls.description: A list of URLs to request location data for the children of this location.

locationParent.description: Name of the location that this location is in.

locationParentUrl.description: URL to request location data for the parent of this location.

locationParentHierarchy.description: When querying for the hierarchy, the location's parent hierarchy

locationChildHierarchy.description: When querying for the hierarchy, the location's set of immediate children and associated hierarchy

domainCode.description: Three character domain abbreviation (D01, D02, etc) for the domain this site is in

siteCode.description: Four character code for the site

locationProperties.description: List of properties associated with the location.  Contents vary based on the type of location.

locationPropertyValue.description: Can be a string or a number

locationUtmZone.description: The integer Universal Transverse Mercator zone.

locationUtmHemisphere.description: The single character Universal Transverse Mercator hemisphere.

alphaOrientation.description: The angle (in degrees) at which the sensor is facing relative to true North.

xOffset.description: Cartesian offsets of a sensor, in meters, east (positive values) or west (negative values) relative to where the geolocation point was taken.

yOffset.description: Cartesian offsets of a sensor, in meters, north (positive values) or south (negative values) relative to where the geolocation point was taken.

zOffset.description: Cartesian offsets of a sensor, in meters, up (positive values) or down (negative values) relative to where the geolocation point was taken.

coordinates.description: A list of vertices that define the closed structure for the polygon

latitude.description: Decimal latitude for the polygon coordinate.

longitude.description: Decimal longitude for the polygon coordinate.

locationProperties.description: List of properties associated with the location.  Contents vary based on the type of location.

locationPropertyValue.description: Can be a string or a number

locationParent.description: Name of the location that this location is in.

locationParentUrl.description: URL to request location data for the parent of this location.

name.description: The name of the external data object.

type.description: The type of external data link provided.

acceptedTaxonID.description: Accepted taxonomic code from the authoritative source (dwc:nameAccordingToID)

dwc:scientificName.description: Scientific name, associated with the taxonID.  This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/scientificName

dwc:scientificNameAuthorship.description: The authorship information for the scientificName formatted according to the conventions of the applicable nomenclaturalCode.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/scientificNameAuthorship

dwc:taxonRank.description: The lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined for the individual or specimen.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/taxonRank

taxonProtocolCategory.description: NEON protocol-specific categorization of the taxon

dwc:nameAccordingToID.description: An identifier for the source in which the specific taxon concept circumscription is defined or implied.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/nameAccordingToID

dwc:nameAccordingToTitle.description: The reference to the source in which the specific taxon concept circumscription is defined or implied.  http://tdwg.github.io/dwc/terms/nameAccordingTo

dwc:kingdom.description: The scientific name of the kingdom in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/kingdom

gbif:subkingdom.description: The scientific name of the subkingdom in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subkingdom

gbif:infrakingdom.description: The scientific name of the infrakingdom in which the taxon is classified

gbif:superdivision.description: The scientific name of the superdivision in which the taxon is classified

gbif:division.description: The scientific name of the division in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/phylum

gbif:subdivision.description: The scientific name of the subdivision in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subphylum

gbif:infradivision.description: The scientific name of the infradivision in which the taxon is classified

gbif:parvdivision.description: The scientific name of the parvdivision in which the taxon is classified

gbif:superphylum.description: The scientific name of the superphylum in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/superphylum

dwc:phylum.description: The scientific name of the phylum or division in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/phylum

gbif:subphylum.description: The scientific name of the subphylum in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subphylum

gbif:infraphylum.description: The scientific name of the infraphylum in which the taxon is classified

gbif:superclass.description: The scientific name of the superclass in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/superclass

dwc:class.description: The scientific name of the class in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/class

gbif:subclass.description: The scientific name of the subclass in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subclass

gbif:infraclass.description: The scientific name of the infraclass in which the taxon is classified

gbif:superorder.description: The scientific name of the superorder in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/superorder

dwc:order.description: The scientific name of the order in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/order

gbif:suborder.description: The scientific name of the suborder in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/suborder

gbif:infraorder.description: The scientific name of the infraorder in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/infraorder

gbif:section.description: The scientific name of the section in which the organism is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/section

gbif:subsection.description: The scientific name of the subsection in which the organism is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subsection

gbif:superfamily.description: The scientific name of the superfamily in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/superfamily

dwc:family.description: The scientific name of the family in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/family

gbif:subfamily.description: The scientific name of the subfamily in which the organism is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subfamily

gbif:tribe.description: The scientific name of the tribe in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/tribe

gbif:subtribe.description: The scientific name of the subtribe in which the taxon is classified.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subtribe

dwc:genus.description: The scientific name of the genus in which the organism is classified.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/genus

dwc:subgenus.description: The scientific name of the subgenus in which the taxon is classified.  Values should include the genus to avoid homonym confusion.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/subgenus

gbif:subspecies.description: The subspecies (infraspecific name below the rank of infraspecific epithet) of the scientific name applied to the taxon.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subspecies

gbif:variety.description: The variety (infraspecific name below the rank of infraspecific epithet) of the scientific name applied to the taxon.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/variety

gbif:subvariety.description: The subvariety (infraspecific name below the rank of variety) of the scientific name applied to the taxon.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subvariety

gbif:form.description: The form (infraspecific name below the rank of infraspecific epithet) of the scientific name applied to the taxon.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/form

gbif:subform.description: The subform (infraspecific name below the rank of form) of the scientific name applied to the taxon.  http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/rank/subform

speciesGroup.description: The unofficial species group into which the taxon is categorized

dwc:specificEpithet.description: The specific epithet (second part of the species name) of the scientific name applied to the taxon.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/specificEpithet

dwc:infraspecificEpithet.description: The infraspecific epithet (scientific name below the rank of species) of the scientific name applied to the taxon.  http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/infraspecificEpithet

sampleTag.description: Sample Tag for a given sample

sampleClass.description: Sample Class for a given sample

barcode.description: Sample Barcode for a given sample

archiveGuid.description: Archive GUID for a given sample

sampleViews.description: array of sample views for a given sample

sampleTag.description: Sample Tag for a given sample

sampleClass.description: Sample Class for a given sample

barcode.description: Sample Barcode for a given sample

archiveGuid.description: Archive GUID for a given sample

sampleEvent.description: Sample Event for a given sample.

sampleClasses.description: array of Sample Classes for a given sample.

entries.description: array of Sample Classes and their descriptions for a given sample.
